item.title: Assembling my Floppy Emu from Big Mess O' Wires
item.description: Back on February 1st I ordered a Floppy Emu from Big Mess O' Wires. The Floppy Emu emulates a floppy disk drive. Floppy disk images can be stored on the SD card and mounted from the Floppy Emu itself. This makes it a lot easier to transfer and use software â€¦
item.dc:creator: loai
